name: 7th Residential Energy Storage Forum
content: Join us for the 7th edition of the Residential Energy Storage Forum at the Radisson Blu Plaza Hotel in Sydney, Australia between 22-25th June 2020! Gain more in depth insights on the latest challenges being faced in the Residential Energy Storage industry and brainstorm solutions with top professionals in the field. Listen to the first-hand experience of over 14 utilities including AUSNET SERVICES, SA POWER NETWORKS, AGL ENERGY, ENERGY QUEENSLAND, SYNERGY, JEMENA, ORIGIN ENERGY, AUSGRID, WESTERN POWER, WEMAG and more! Register for 2 Pre-Forum Masterclasses, covering topics on Commercial and Industrial Energy Storage Revenue Stacking and on Achieving a Cost-effective Residential Energy Storage Installation Process - and learn directly from experienced professionals in an intimate classroom setting. Check out the full programme here: http://bit.ly/RESF2020
